message:
A New Push Against Human Trafficking on Flights 
Training is expanding at airports, from skycaps to shop clerks, and signs are going up, including one in every bathroom stall at the Las Vegas airport.

data.description: U.S. airports, airlines and Homeland Security are working to educate employees and passengers for signs of exploited people they see traveling.
data.title: A New Push Against Human Trafficking on Flights
